input.description: timeout-secs[Optional] Time in seconds after which the request will time-out of not completed. Default is: 60 secs

managementpack-name[Required] The name of the management pack that will be retrieved by the wrapper. If the name contains spaces it should be enclosed in single quotes.
NOTE: There are a few discrepencies in the naming between SCOM application and API. 1. In the SCOM application, the value provided in ID is actually mapped to 'Name' attribute of management pack in SCOM API. 2. In the SCOM application, the value provided in Name is actually mapped to 'DisplayName' attribute of management pack in SCOM API.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <operation-name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">get-managementpack-by-name</xsl:text> </operation-name> <timeout-secs> <xsl:value-of select="'${timeout secs}'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </timeout-secs> <command-parameters> <managementpack-name> <xsl:value-of select="'${tok1}'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </managementpack-name> </command-parameters> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: Utility to create items xml for the process - "Find Management Pack By name"
